Producer: Neil Canton, Mark Canton, Elie Samaha
Production Co: Carter Productions LLC, Warner Brothers, Franchise Pictures, Morgan Creek Productions, Canton Company
Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, SDDS
Synopsis: Sylvester Stallone plays Jack Carter, a Vegas mobster who comes home to Seattle to bury his brother after an apparent car accident. Once home he begins to believe that it may not have been an accident. His two-day journey through the underbelly of the city leads Jack through revenge, reconnection with a family he left behind many year earlier, and, ultimately, redemption.
Title: Get Carter
